title: Lowell Farms' Focus on Flower: Pre-Rolled Cannabis
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Cannabis flower usage and pre-rolls with Lowell Farms' Chairman George Allen. The developing retail picture, competitive form factors and the maturing consumer. Lowell's new 35s, bringing elegance to joints and making sense of the industry.
